title: Pool Party Miss Fortune
body: I wanted to point out that in the client shop when purchasing or browsing for skins, wards, etc., there is a little mess-up with Miss Fortune's Pool Party slice for the "What's New" section. In "Featured Items" for her bundle her splash slice is portrayed correctly with the updated splash but for the "What's New" section it's the old, out-of-date splash slice.

replies.body:
Hey Pokeyoko! 

Thanks for the report! Looks like we just missed a spot for the updated splash! We'll get this fixed up! :D
